question: you have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. you are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour. write a letter to your neighbour in your letter introduce yourself ? describe your plans for the party invite your neighbour to come.
text: I am writing this letter to you to introduce myself; I am a praveena and working as a Chartered Accountant. I am your new neighbour and inform you that I am planning for a party  next Saturday in my apartment.

First of all, it will be a small gathering, but we will have music and dance, food and beverages so it is very likely to get a little bit loud in our place. I need to assure you that the noise will not be a problem. Moreover, in order to remember this, I organised a party on that day and arranged a musical band, singing songs and dance for celebrating to this special occasion.
Lastly, if you may haven’t any problem with our party, I would kindly ask you and your family to join  us and we are happier to warmly welcome you on that day.

error_list.error_des: If you do not want praveena to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
